name: BYond Plaxotronic
description:
This game was an experimental project that I made in 2012, which helped me gain enough confidence to transition from working in two dimension development to three dimensional development. Though this game is highly experimental, I does convey… something… just before touching down on the world. The merge of music and platforming was pretty interesting in retrospect.

There is no apparent story to the game, and no detailed objective. All the game gives you is, "Follow the music"… initially you must traverse the world presented and collect the square chips by following the sound of music that will be playing and changing as you progress from song to song.

This game is not for everyone, and is a very casual and slow progressing game.

so with that… hopefully you enjoy the game… :3
